title: 2022–2023 Toxicological Sciences: Paper of the Year
content: Members of the Society of Toxicology Board of Publications meet annually to consider every paper published in Toxicological Sciences over the previous July–June 12-month period. The Board also takes member nominations into consideration and then selects one as the Paper of the Year for making significant contributions to toxicology. As a top journal in the field of toxicology, it is always a difficult task! The award is presented at the Society of Toxicology Annual Meeting, held in March.
